title: Navarathna Vanki: The Emerald Radiance Bangle
features: This stunning Vanki features a central floral motif adorned with an emerald, creating a focal point of vibrant green. The design incorporates intricate filigree work interspersed with Ruby accents and Polki diamonds, a traditional South Indian stone setting that evokes timeless elegance. The openwork bangle style adds a modern touch to the traditional design. The metal has a Hyderabadi polish which enhances its shine and durability.
occasions: and other special occasions. Its versatile design also makes it suitable for grand parties and social gatherings.
description: This Vanki is a true testament to exquisite craftsmanship. The combination of traditional techniques and modern design makes it a timeless piece. The use of natural gemstones not only adds to its beauty but also carries traditional Navarathna (నవరత్నాలు) significance, believed to bring prosperity and good fortune to the wearer. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability.
